item.title: looking for a 1 day a week-ish job ðŸŽ¯
item.description: Hey, I am looking for a one day a week job in arts/games/charity-work/idk what else. I used to run OUTPUT gallery alongside my work at The White Pube but I had to leave OUTPUT when I got Long Covid. I can’t go back to that job - it’s just too physical. I’m not 100% recovered but I’ve got enough life back in me to pick up a second job so I thought I’d write this blog post.
